content:
Does anyone know of existing, ongoing or future work happening around OR planning on FHIR?
I am mostly interested in the specifics of using the appointment scheduling framework to schedule procedures and manage OR ressources, maybe even involving ActivityDefinition to define requirements for specific ORs and SupplyRequests to allocate them...
Any work happening around OR documentation might also be useful...

Thanks for the questions on our behalf @Simone Heckmann . We are just looking into the correct resource to save real time timestamps, following the VOPM. One procedure for each period during the operation e.g. incision to suture time seems to be the way to go, but now I read the following in the procedure documentation: The creation of a resource to support detailed real-time procedure information awaits the identification of a specific implementation use-case to share such information. Any ideas?
Well, you have one, so please step up to the plate. I'm also aware of some HL7v3 work I've done in the past for a Norwegian project to capture such infomation. @Line Saele ?
